attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Remove immeadiatley all aid, help, advice and assistance in all forms from the Sudanese government until it arranges for the release from jail of the teacher Gillian Gibbons. The Sudanese should apologise to Ms. Gibbons for the tactless and sensless attack on a well meaning person. Advice and guidance in the strange ways of Muslims would have done more good than a hammer. The British government should make it quite clear to the Sudan that the British people will not tolerate our tax money being wasted on such thoughtless people as themselves.

rejection.details: Mrs Gibbons has now been released.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
